solution_line_template: Gretchen bowled a {gretchen_score} + Mitzi boweld a {mitzi_score} + Beth bowled an {beth_score} = <<{gretchen_score}+{mitzi_score}+{beth_score}={combined_score}>>{combined_score} combined score.
The average of their combined score of {combined_score} / {num_bowlers} bowlers = <<{combined_score}/{num_bowlers}={average_score}>>{average_score}.
